articles.title: ‘Every single cage is full’: Nearly 100 cats rescued from Rhode Island hoarding situation
articles.description:
Ninety-seven cats were rescued from a 1200-square foot-apartment in Woonsocket, RI, the shelter said.

The post ‘Every single cage is full’: Nearly 100 cats rescued from Rhode Island hoarding situation appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ninety-seven cats were rescued from a hoarding situation in Woonsocket, RI.
The rescue occurred in a 1200-square foot apartment, highlighting severe overcrowding.
Boston shelters may see an influx of adoptable cats from this rescue effort.

articles.title: Anderson Cooper says he’s exiting from ’60 Minutes,’ but staying with CNN
articles.description:
His decision comes at a time of turmoil at “60 Minutes.”

summary: Anderson Cooper announced his exit from '60 Minutes' on February 16, 2026.

Boston viewers may see changes in news coverage as Cooper shifts focus.

articles.title: Bruins’ Jordan Harris looking to make hockey more accessible, inclusive in Mass.
articles.description:
"I think it’s important for kids to see players that maybe look like them or have similar backgrounds."

The post Bruins’ Jordan Harris looking to make hockey more accessible, inclusive in Mass. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins player Jordan Harris advocates for inclusivity in hockey for Massachusetts youth.
Harris emphasizes representation for kids from diverse backgrounds in sports.
Initiatives aim to increase participation in hockey among underrepresented communities.
